title: Projects
description: In addition to my professional work, I have also worked on a number of personal projects, both on my own and collaboratively

projects.name: Football Stats

projects.description: A small app that tracks results and statistics of football matches played between a pool of players each week

projects.name: Profile

projects.name: Report Writer
projects.description: A app that generates tailored, editable student reports for teachers to save time
